languages.text: "Не до конца", {n}— Хейнрикс убийственно серьезен.{/n} "Каждый варп-активный человек на этой планете чувствует нарастающее колдовство... подобно цунами. Я почти никогда не сталкивался ни с чем подобным в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g}. И — что особенно примечательно — колдовство продолжает нарастать. Но вот что запустило эту реакцию и куда пропал свет — этого я сказать не могу".

traits.locale_text: "Не до конца", {n}— Хейнрикс убийственно серьезен.{/n} "Каждый варп-активный человек на этой планете чувствует нарастающее колдовство... подобно цунами. Я почти никогда не сталкивался ни с чем подобным в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g}. И — что особенно примечательно — колдовство продолжает нарастать. Но вот что запустило эту реакцию и куда пропал свет — этого я сказать не могу".

languages.text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."
languages.original_text: "Не до конца", {n}— Хейнрикс убийственно серьезен.{/n} "Каждый варп-активный человек на этой планете чувствует нарастающее колдовство... подобно цунами. Я почти никогда не сталкивался ни с чем подобным в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g}. И — что особенно примечательно — колдовство продолжает нарастать. Но вот что запустило эту реакцию и куда пропал свет — этого я сказать не могу".

I've barely ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, which is especially remarkable, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

"Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

languages.text: "Nur ein unvollständiges Bild." {n}Heinrix klingt todernst.{/n} "Jede warp-aktive Person auf diesem Planeten spürt die Anwesenheit der Hexerei ... Sie baut sich auf wie ein Tsunami. Ich habe so etwas im {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} fast noch nie erlebt. Und besonders bemerkenswert ist, dass die Hexerei noch weiter zunimmt. Ich kann aber nicht sagen, was diese Reaktion ausgelöst hat oder wohin das Licht verschwunden ist."
languages.original_text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein unvollständiges Bild." {n}Heinrix klingt todernst.{/n} "Jede warp-aktive Person auf diesem Planeten spürt die Anwesenheit der Hexerei ... Sie baut sich auf wie ein Tsunami. Ich habe so etwas im {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} fast noch nie erlebt. Und besonders bemerkenswert ist, dass die Hexerei noch weiter zunimmt. Ich kann aber nicht sagen, was diese Reaktion ausgelöst hat oder wohin das Licht verschwunden ist."

languages.text: « Je n'en ai qu'une vague idée, {n}répond Heinrix d'un ton très sérieux.{/n} Chaque personne sensible au Warp sur cette planète perçoit la présence de la sorcellerie... Elle grandit comme un tsunami. Je n'ai jamais rien rencontré de tel dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. Et, le plus remarquable, c'est que la sorcellerie continue de grandir. Je ne peux pas dire ce qui a déclenché cette réaction, cependant, ni où est passée la lumière. »
languages.original_text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai qu'une vague idée, {n}répond Heinrix d'un ton très sérieux.{/n} Chaque personne sensible au Warp sur cette planète perçoit la présence de la sorcellerie... Elle grandit comme un tsunami. Je n'ai jamais rien rencontré de tel dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. Et, le plus remarquable, c'est que la sorcellerie continue de grandir. Je ne peux pas dire ce qui a déclenché cette réaction, cependant, ni où est passée la lumière. »

languages.text: “只有残缺不全的信息。”{n}海因里希的声音非常严肃。{/n}“这颗行星上的每个灵能者都能感受到巫术的存在……它就像海啸一般。我在{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中几乎从来没遇到过这样的事情。而且最值得注意的是，巫术的力量仍在增强。我说不清是什么原因引发了这种现象，也不知道光芒都去了哪里。”
languages.original_text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

traits.locale_text: “只有残缺不全的信息。”{n}海因里希的声音非常严肃。{/n}“这颗行星上的每个灵能者都能感受到巫术的存在……它就像海啸一般。我在{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}中几乎从来没遇到过这样的事情。而且值得注意的是，巫术的力量仍在增强。我说不清是什么原因引发了这种现象，也不知道光芒都去了哪里。”

languages.text: 「ただの不完全な情報です」{n}ハインリックスは恐ろしく真剣だ。{/n}「この惑星のあらゆる精神感応能力者が魔術の存在を感じています…それが津波のように高まっている。我は{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}でこれに似たものに遭遇したことはありません。そして、特に注目すべきことに、魔法は今も増幅している。ただし、この反応を引き起こしたのが何なのか、また光がどこに行ったのかは、我には告げることができません」
languages.original_text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

traits.locale_text: 「ただの不完全な情報だ」{n}ハインリックスは恐ろしく真剣だ。{/n}「この惑星のあらゆる精神感応能力者が魔法の存在を感じている…それは津波のように高まっている。俺は{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}でこれに似たものに遭遇したことがない。そして、特に注目すべきことに、魔法はまだ増幅している。ただし、この反応を引き起こしたのは何か、また光がどこに行ったのか、俺には分からない」

languages.text: «Solo una imagen incompleta». {n}Heinrix habla muy en serio.{/n} «Cada persona que siente la disformidad en este planeta siente la brujería... Está subiendo como un tsunami. Apenas he encontrado nada parecido en {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}el espacio real{/g}. Y, lo que es más llamativo, la brujería sigue creciendo. Sin embargo, no sé qué ha provocado esta reacción ni adónde ha ido a parar la luz».
languages.original_text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

traits.locale_text: «Solo una imagen incompleta». {n}Heinrix habla muy en serio.{/n} «Cada persona que siente la disformidad en este planeta siente la brujería... Está subiendo como un tsunami. Apenas he encontrado nada parecido en {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}el espacio real{/g}. Y, lo que es más llamativo, la brujería sigue creciendo. Sin embargo, no sé qué ha provocado esta reacción ni adónde ha ido a parar la luz».

languages.text: "Bu, resmin sadece görünen kısmı." {n}Heinrix'in sesinden ciddiyet damlıyor.{/n} "Bu gezegendeki öteboyuta duyarlı her şahıs, bu sahirliğin varlığından haberdardır. Âdeta tsunami gibi kabarıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Gerçekuzayda{/g} böylesine rastlamamıştım. Asıl mühim olan ise sahirliğin varlığının güçlenmeye devam etmesi. Lakin ne bu olaya neyin sebep olduğunu ne de ışığın nereye kaybolduğunu söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Only an incomplete picture." {n}Heinrix sounds deadly serious.{/n} "Every warp-active person on this planet is sensing the presence of sorcery... It's rising like a tsunami. I have hardly ever encountered anything like it in {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. And, most remarkably, the sorcery is still growing. I cannot, however, say what set off this reaction or where the light has gone."

traits.locale_text: "Daha neler neler oluyor..." {n}Heinrix aşırı ciddi bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu gezegendeki her öteboyuta duyarlı şahıs, bu sahirliğin varlığından haberdar. Âdeta tsunami gibi yükseliyor... {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Gerçekuzay{/g}da böylesini görmemiştim. Asıl hayret verici olansa sahirliğin varlığının güçlenmeye devam etmesi. Bu olaya neyin sebep olduğunu veya ışığın nereye kaybolduğunu gözlemleyemiyorum."
